page.title: 10GLENCRAIG COMMUNITY II
page.content: { All the children are separated into classes according to age and there are eight classes.They work to a specific timetable doing 3 hours in the morning and 3\ in the afternoon.In class they play games,paint,knit,dance and listen to stories or music.They attend the community's own chapel every Sunday. On the farm they have cows, hens, ducks, bees and a donkey.The animal produce is used by the community and none of it is sold.They have 100 acres of land which includes an orchard and a vegetable garden.The rest of their food and essentials are bought locally and delivered to a central store from where each house can collect it as required.
